title.rendered: Buy Minecraft PC Bundle – Microsoft Store en-LI

content.rendered:
Play Minecraft: Java Edition and Minecraft: Bedrock Edition on Windows 10 and 11 as part of your Xbox Game Pass for PC or Ultimate subscription*. It also means you can comfortably play with any current version of Minecraft, including those for consoles and mobile! Just start the same edition as the Minecraft player you want to play with. So you no longer have to make any selections – experience Minecraft on PC with just one launcher thanks to Game Pass. * Terms and conditions and restrictions apply. Game Pass for PC Catalog will vary over time by region and device. To be played on devices running Windows 10 or 11. Not supported on Windows 10 in S mode and on ARM devices. Visit xbox.com/gamepass-forpc for more information.

show more

excerpt.rendered: Play Minecraft: Java Edition and Minecraft: Bedrock Edition on Windows 10 and 11 as part of your Xbox Game Pass
